description: Code your brains out. An event in which you mix logic with your coding skills.
tag_line: TALK IS CHEAP, SHOW ME THE CODE

rules.info: Base language: ANSI C, Base IDE: Bloodshed Dev-C++ 4.4.1 (or higher)
Solve each challenge level by level, no skipping questions
Fastest 6 (might change depending on no. of teams participating) teams will qualify for the finals
Choice of compilers: ANSI C/ C++
Solve each problem level by level, no skipping questions
Winners will be decided based on (decreasing order of priority):Time taken to conquer the problems.Logic competency.Execution efficiency of the program;Coding standards
